DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Average line to line [V]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 206, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Average line to neutral [V]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 42, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Average line current [A]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 46, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F2\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Sum of line currents [A]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 48, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F2\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Neutral current [A]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 224, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F2\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Total system volt amps [VA]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 56, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Total system reactive power [VAr]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 60, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)\r\n"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Total system power factor"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 62, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F3\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Total system phase angle"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 66, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Frequency of supply voltages [Hz]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 70, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Total VAh [kVAh]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 80, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Total VArh [kVArh]"},"ReadFormula":"TOSTRING(MODBUSR(A, 344, BigEndianFloat), \u0022F1\u0022)"}]

DeviceProperties.ReadDemand: var demand := MODBUSR(A, 52, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(demand * -1), return(0));
var demand := MODBUSR(A, 12, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(demand * -1), return(0));
var demand := MODBUSR(A, 14, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(demand * -1), return(0));
var demand := MODBUSR(A, 12, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(demand * -1), return(0));
var demand := MODBUSR(A, 52, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(0), return(demand));
var demand := MODBUSR(A, 12, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(0), return(demand));
var demand := MODBUSR(A, 14, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(0), return(demand));
var demand := MODBUSR(A, 16, BigEndianFloat) / 1000; if (demand < 0, return(0), return(demand));
